channel.title: My devolpment (hiring)
channel.description:
looking for a hoster and 2 admins and 2 mods if u wanna host tell me and then ill give u the download link i would host my server but this the whole thing bout the devolpment if u would like to be part of the devolpment i also need web desiners also coders for the server
Code: [code]what u want to do: why u want it: aim or msn:[/code]
ty
[b][s][shadow=red,left]what i have added to the server[/shadow][/s][/b]
full barrows -Stat bugs FIXED -New interface commands(testing purposes) -Full Demon attack emotes! -Guthan set effect -Ancient spells (All for npcs, Ice and Shadow barrage for pking) -90% Ancient Teleports -85% Ranging!(Dont have arrows installed yet. Max range hit based off range lvl!) -FULL MAGIC ON PLAYER(Pking and CastleWars!) -Lots of weapon emotes -New items in shops -Some new NPCs -AutoSave! (Saves EVERYONES account every 60 seconds) -Fixed Potions (Thanks Drags for all your help, Pots work now) -Set effects for the 3 melee barrow brothers -New method for magic (doesnt crash anymore) -Fixed some item slots -Fixed Device(cannon) makes you fly! -Complete help Menu -Easy Teleport to CastleWars and Wilderness -Base Ability for Summon -Mod Bot -New spawn area(Tzhaar) -More NPC's including Tzhaar npcs -Shops and banks for Tzhaar -Ojbects for Tzhaar -Gnome Agility Course -Max for stats raised to 135 -Jad cave with intense training and tons of NPCs -TzHaar mages attack with flames -Added some new items like: *-Fire Cape *-Dragon 2H *-Obby Cape *-Full Infinity *-Fury Amulate *-Mage Book *-Dragon Hatchet -Fixed Login Problem -Reduced autospawn to reduce lag -Pking Area for TzHaar! -Added more commands -Teleport a player to you -Teleport to a player -Teleports now 100%! -Ancient Teleports now 100%! -Added Global Drops!! -Added Drop items when you die! -Added Full Pking Modern Magic with GFX and Projectiles -Fixed Global drops and full pickup method! -Added Teleother(Not working correctly) -Added Multi Target Barrages -Fixed Multi Ice and Shadow Barrages! -Completly redid magic...again... -Fixed HitPoint Bug -Added support for summoning -Added working pets! -Added Global Objects -Fixed NPC Spawns -Put a timer Pking Ice Barrages -Fixed Teleother! -Added Temp Player look -Got Full Item.cfg -Added loads of npcs -Added support for New NPCs + Areas -Face NPC Bug Fixed!!! -Added Dungeons, Guilds, Shops -Added more bows for Ranging -Secured AutoSpawn and fixed NPC Hits bug -ALL BUGS FIXED! (No more crashes!) -ForbiddenScape Fully Secured, No Serious bugs -Added Retribution Prayer -Working ALL Prayers! -Added Prayer Head Icons! -Added all Strength Prayers -Prayer restores over time -Made HeadIcon testing command -FIXED INVISABLE PLAYER BUGS COMPLETLY!!!! -Added Amour Defense Bonuses -Added Fully Bronze-Dragon Defense bonuses 100% -Added Barrows + Godly Armor Defense Bonuses -Fixed Dragon Hide Top Glitch Green-Black
[b][u][shadow=red,left]what i want my coders to add[/shadow][/u][/b]quests if possiable silab items
hoster -
admins - -
mods - -
fourm desiners - -
coders - -
contact me:aim:murphy0lee

item.title: My devolpment (hiring)
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

“What you have added to your server.” Those aren’t yours. You just opened project 16s client.java, copied the information at the top of it, and pasted it here?

Also why make another one of these? I have been you make one of this yesterday, stick to one thread. You have made at least 3 threads of this please stick to 1 thread…

Read full topic

item.description:

what u want to do:Admin,I cna also make forums/website,make sure glitchs are fixed and help you out whenever you want.
why u want it:Because I have a ton of extra time and the server im working on has been delayed and I like helpin out.
aim or msn:my aim is conductndestruct
